column10: error | from the subgraph formed from the given paths
column11: clone nodes with their labels and properties (optionally skipping any properties in the skipProperties list via the config map)
column12: and clone the relationships (will exist between cloned nodes only). Relationships can be optionally redirected according to standinNodes node pairings (this is a list of list-pairs of nodes)
column13: so given a node in the original subgraph (first of the pair)
column14: an existing node (second of the pair) can act as a standin for it within the cloned subgraph. Cloned relationships will be redirected to the standin.
